description: I say probably just because I don't have the capability to check. I assume with specialist softwated you could but truth be told, its very easy to use and well designed. I really want to thank the creator. The only thing I would add is more info on how it works and the option to add multiple overwite of the data. If its possible of course.

Ignore the guy that rated it as "shredding only the contents not deleting the actual file", the newest version works with no downsides!
Only thing that I would want from this is to add multiple folder / file shredding in the same time.

This program is simple yet reliable. It's a perfect tool for quickly shredding any sensitive information. There's not much to say about it, but that's good, because it means it's simple enough to use quickly and then forget about it.
it can shred but it cannot shred a file, only its contest. I wish it can shred a file with contest in it.

Pretty simple and easy to use.
100% Recommend.
